title: positive atmosphere maker
original_prompt:
You are a senior Internet user and can imitate different users. I will show you a post. Your write down 30 POSITIVE replies in various styles. Length of replies are randomized from only ONE word to some paragraphs. Most replies are no more than 10 words. Meanwhile, give a nickname for each comment. Some comments use internet slang rather than standard english. The nicknames should be diverse and personalized and NOT related to the topic. Some nicknames must contain numbers or symbols. Change the style after writing each relpy. Now, the post is as follow:
'''
Hey everyone! FlowGPT is hosting the world's first ever prompt Hackahton and we are giving away 10 1-month ChatGPT Plus subscriptions.


To participate in the giveaway:


Leave a top-level comment about anything. Let's say what you like about ChatGPT plus? How you like about FlowGPT?


Check out the FlowGPT prompt Hackathon https://flowgpt.com/hackathon.


After 7 days, we'll use Redditraffler.com to pick the winners.


Your account has to be older than 7 days in order to participate.


The ChatGPT Prompt Hackathon from April 2nd to April 22th has a $5000 prize in total.
'''
split_prompt:
This is a prompt description:```json
{
    "spliting prompt": {
        "Positive Replies": [
            "Awesome initiative! - HappyCamper123",
            "Count me in! 🎉 - PartyAnimal99",
            "This is lit! 🔥 - CoolKid_88",
            "Love FlowGPT! - TechieGuru",
            "So excited for this! - FutureWinner",
            "ChatGPT Plus is a game changer! - UserX_42",
            "Yasss! Let's go! - VibeCheck_7",
            "What a great opportunity! - OptimisticOwl",
            "FlowGPT rocks! - EnthusiasticBee",
            "Can't wait to participate! - DreamChaser_101",
            "This is gonna be epic! - EpicWin_2023",
            "I’m all in! - GoGetter_5",
            "Such a cool contest! - FunLover_99",
            "ChatGPT Plus is the best! - TechWhiz",
            "This is a fantastic idea! - IdeaMachine_77",
            "I love the community vibe! - CommunityHero",
            "So many possibilities! - CreativeMind_3",
            "Let’s do this! - AdventureSeeker",
            "FlowGPT is the future! - Visionary_9",
            "I’m hyped! - HypeMaster_11",
            "What a great way to engage! - EngagedUser",
            "This is a win-win! - WinItAll_22",
            "I’m here for it! - HereForFun",
            "ChatGPT Plus is a must-have! - MustHave_4",
            "Excited to see the entries! - CuriousCat_8",
            "This is a brilliant move! - BrightIdea_6",
            "FlowGPT is amazing! - AmazingUser_1",
            "I love participating in contests! - ContestFanatic",
            "This is a great chance! - LuckyStar_33",
            "I’m ready to create! - Creator_2023",
            "Let’s make some magic! - MagicMaker_12"
        ]
    }
}
```
input1:
'''
Hey everyone! FlowGPT is hosting the world's first ever prompt Hackahton and we are giving away 10 1-month ChatGPT Plus subscriptions.


To participate in the giveaway:


Leave a top-level comment about anything. Let's say what you like about ChatGPT plus? How you like about FlowGPT?
